sentence: But to many Georgia Republicans, he is one of us. THOMASTON, Ga. Brian Kemp, Georgias incumbent governor and a prominent fixture on former President Donald J. Trumps enemies list, was clip-clopping around in a pair of cowboy boots in this small city on a recent morning, glad-handing his way through an adoring Republican throng at a place called Greatest Generation Memorial Park.
title: What Donald Trump Didnt Count On in Georgia
